p: Structured Illumination Microscopy (SIM) imaging was performed using Plan-Apochromat 63x/1.4 oil DIC M27 objective, in a Zeiss Elyra PS.1 microscope (Zeiss). Images were acquired using 5 phase shifts and 3 grid rotations with the 561 and 488 nm lasers (at 5–10% of maximum output), and filter set 4 (1,851–248, Zeiss). Images were acquired using a sCMOS (pco.edge sCMOS) camera.
